title: Evangelical worship is spiritual vvorship as it was discussed in a sermon preached before the Right Honourable the Lord Maior, at Pauls Church, Aug. 26. 1660. By Matthew Poole minister of the Gospel at Michael Quern in London.
author: Poole, Matthew, 1624-1679.
publisher: printed for Sa. Thomson at the Bishops-head in Pauls Church-yard,
